name: CS Add Featured Image to RSS Feed
author: Chetan Satasiya

sections.description: This plugin will Add Featured Image or Post Thumbnail to RSS Feed.
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘CS Add Featured Image to RSS Feed’
  3. Activate CS Add Featured Image to RSS Feed from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download CS Add Featured Image to RSS Feed.
  2. Upload the ‘cs-add-featured-image-to-rss-feed’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate CS Add Featured Image to RSS Feed from your Plugins page.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Compatible with the latest WordPress versions

1.0.0

  • Initial release

upgrade_notice: Automatic updates should work great for you. As always, though, we recommend backing up your site prior to making any updates just to be sure nothing goes wrong.
